headline.main: 22 MEN EXAMINED FOR JOBS IN BRITAIN; Teacher, Elevator Operator and a Sheet Metal Worker Are Among First Tested

lead_paragraph: A silversmith, a stationary fireman, a Spanish teacher, an elevator operator, a credit man and a sheet-metal worker joined with full-time workers in the radio industry yesterday in the first group examination for technicians to man the new radiolocators now being used in Britain to spot enemy planes.
abstract: RCA Inst supervises radiolocator exams, N Y C
